From the original cohort of 711 individuals who met these criteria, 23 subjects were excluded because of missing covariates and 1 subject because of the presence of aortic and iliac intraluminal prostheses, leaving a final sample of 687 individuals, 351 women (mean age 66±12 years, range 31-95) and 336 men (mean age 68±13 years, range 28-94).
Use of medications was determined at each study visit according to the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical classification system recommended by the World Health Organization.
